name: INOXOFT
description:
Inoxoft is an outsourcing software development solutions provider for any business. We transform ideas for digitalization into high-quality products that fulfill your business needs and match all requirements. We specialize in web & mobile development for Android, iOS and Hybrid platforms, custom software solutions, cloud systems, artificial intelligence, and natural processing language integration.
We provide necessary Business Analysis and Quality Assurance services that ensure 100% success - high traffic, increased conversion, great performance with UI/UX done for end user's satisfaction, security, and support. 
Collaboration with companies of a variety of industries has made our experience solid for accepting challenges and solving narrow field cases. Founders of e-commerce startups, healthcare institutions, HR industry clients, currency exchange brokers, educational institutions and clients with needs for digitalization of inventorization, transportation or logistics processes - all worked with us and received what they expected. 
We build relationships on trust and tight cooperation. Our developers stay at the forefront of all the latest technologies, our project coordinators use the most effective project management tools and methods. We communicate everything daily, so to be ensured changes, ideas and processes are understandable to our clients and negotiated. 
Inoxoft offers the most comfortable conditions for cooperation and takes into account all clients' needs. We work according to the Fixed Price Model, Discovery Phase, Extended Team and Dedicated Team models of cooperation. We stay flexible to all changes and desires and suggest improvements and ideas from our side when necessary. 
Named as Top Software and Web developers by Clutch several times testifies to our ability to deliver the best software development services for you.
